78class RTMIDI_DLL_PUBLIC RtMidiError : public std::exception
79{
80public:
82 enum Type
83 {
84 WARNING,
85 DEBUG_WARNING,
86 UNSPECIFIED,
87 NO_DEVICES_FOUND,
88 INVALID_DEVICE,
89 MEMORY_ERROR,
90 INVALID_PARAMETER,
91 INVALID_USE,
92 DRIVER_ERROR,
93 SYSTEM_ERROR,
94 THREAD_ERROR
95 };
96
98 RtMidiError(const std::string &message, Type type = RtMidiError::UNSPECIFIED) throw()
99 : message_(message), type_(type) {}
100
102 virtual ~RtMidiError(void) throw() {}
103
105 virtual void printMessage(void) const throw() { std::cerr << '\n'
106 << message_ << "\n\n"; }
107
109 virtual const Type &getType(void) const throw() { return type_; }
110
112 virtual const std::string &getMessage(void) const throw() { return message_; }
113
115 virtual const char *what(void) const throw() { return message_.c_str(); }
116
117protected:
118 std::string message_;
119 Type type_;
120};
121
123
130typedef void (*RtMidiErrorCallback)(RtMidiError::Type type, const std::string &errorText, void *userData);

134class RTMIDI_DLL_PUBLIC RtMidi
135{
136public:
137 RtMidi(RtMidi &&other) noexcept;
139 enum Api
140 {
141 UNSPECIFIED,
142 MACOSX_CORE,
143 LINUX_ALSA,
144 UNIX_JACK,
145 WINDOWS_MM,
146 RTMIDI_DUMMY,
147 WEB_MIDI_API,
148 NUM_APIS
149 };
150
152 static std::string getVersion(void) throw();
153
155
160 static void getCompiledApi(std::vector<RtMidi::Api> &apis) throw();
161
163
168 static std::string getApiName(RtMidi::Api api);
169
171
175 static std::string getApiDisplayName(RtMidi::Api api);
176
178
183 static RtMidi::Api getCompiledApiByName(const std::string &name);
184
186 virtual void openPort(unsigned int portNumber = 0, const std::string &portName = std::string("RtMidi")) = 0;
187
189 virtual void openVirtualPort(const std::string &portName = std::string("RtMidi")) = 0;
190
192 virtual unsigned int getPortCount() = 0;
193
195 virtual std::string getPortName(unsigned int portNumber = 0) = 0;
196
198 virtual void closePort(void) = 0;
199
200 void setClientName(const std::string &clientName);
201 void setPortName(const std::string &portName);
202
204
208 virtual bool isPortOpen(void) const = 0;
209
211
215 virtual void setErrorCallback(RtMidiErrorCallback errorCallback = NULL, void *userData = 0) = 0;
216
217protected:
218 RtMidi();
219 virtual ~RtMidi();
220 MidiApi *rtapi_;
221
222 /* Make the class non-copyable */
223 RtMidi(RtMidi &other) = delete;
224 RtMidi &operator=(RtMidi &other) = delete;
225};

227/**********************************************************************/
241/**********************************************************************/
242
243// **************************************************************** //
244//
245// RtMidiIn and RtMidiOut class declarations.
246//
247// RtMidiIn / RtMidiOut are "controllers" used to select an available
248// MIDI input or output interface. They present common APIs for the
249// user to call but all functionality is implemented by the classes
250// MidiInApi, MidiOutApi and their subclasses. RtMidiIn and RtMidiOut
251// each create an instance of a MidiInApi or MidiOutApi subclass based
252// on the user's API choice. If no choice is made, they attempt to
253// make a "logical" API selection.
254//
255// **************************************************************** //
256
257class RTMIDI_DLL_PUBLIC RtMidiIn : public RtMidi
258{
259public:
261 typedef void (*RtMidiCallback)(double timeStamp, std::vector<unsigned char> *message, void *userData);
262
264
281 RtMidiIn(RtMidi::Api api = UNSPECIFIED,
282 const std::string &clientName = "RtMidi Input Client",
283 unsigned int queueSizeLimit = 100);
284
285 RtMidiIn(RtMidiIn &&other) noexcept : RtMidi(std::move(other)) {}
286
288 ~RtMidiIn(void) throw();
289
291 RtMidi::Api getCurrentApi(void) throw();
292
294
299 void openPort(unsigned int portNumber = 0, const std::string &portName = std::string("RtMidi Input"));
300
302
311 void openVirtualPort(const std::string &portName = std::string("RtMidi Input"));
312
314
324 void setCallback(RtMidiCallback callback, void *userData = 0);
325
327
331 void cancelCallback();
332
334 void closePort(void);
335
337
341 virtual bool isPortOpen() const;
342
344
347 unsigned int getPortCount();
348
350
355 std::string getPortName(unsigned int portNumber = 0);
356
358
365 void ignoreTypes(bool midiSysex = true, bool midiTime = true, bool midiSense = true);
366
368
375 double getMessage(std::vector<unsigned char> *message);
376
378
382 virtual void setErrorCallback(RtMidiErrorCallback errorCallback = NULL, void *userData = 0);
383
385
395 virtual void setBufferSize(unsigned int size, unsigned int count);
396
397protected:
398 void openMidiApi(RtMidi::Api api, const std::string &clientName, unsigned int queueSizeLimit);
399};

505
506// **************************************************************** //
507//
508// MidiInApi / MidiOutApi class declarations.
509//
510// Subclasses of MidiInApi and MidiOutApi contain all API- and
511// OS-specific code necessary to fully implement the RtMidi API.
512//
513// Note that MidiInApi and MidiOutApi are abstract base classes and
514// cannot be explicitly instantiated. RtMidiIn and RtMidiOut will
515// create instances of a MidiInApi or MidiOutApi subclass.
516//
517// **************************************************************** //
518
519class RTMIDI_DLL_PUBLIC MidiApi
520{
521public:
522 MidiApi();
523 virtual ~MidiApi();
524 virtual RtMidi::Api getCurrentApi(void) = 0;
525 virtual void openPort(unsigned int portNumber, const std::string &portName) = 0;
526 virtual void openVirtualPort(const std::string &portName) = 0;
527 virtual void closePort(void) = 0;
528 virtual void setClientName(const std::string &clientName) = 0;
529 virtual void setPortName(const std::string &portName) = 0;
530
531 virtual unsigned int getPortCount(void) = 0;
532 virtual std::string getPortName(unsigned int portNumber) = 0;
533
534 inline bool isPortOpen() const { return connected_; }
535 void setErrorCallback(RtMidiErrorCallback errorCallback, void *userData);
536
538 void error(RtMidiError::Type type, std::string errorString);
539
540protected:
541 virtual void initialize(const std::string &clientName) = 0;
542
543 void *apiData_;
544 bool connected_;
545 std::string errorString_;
546 RtMidiErrorCallback errorCallback_;
547 bool firstErrorOccurred_;
548 void *errorCallbackUserData_;
549};
550
551class RTMIDI_DLL_PUBLIC MidiInApi : public MidiApi
552{
553public:
554 MidiInApi(unsigned int queueSizeLimit);
555 virtual ~MidiInApi(void);
556 void setCallback(RtMidiIn::RtMidiCallback callback, void *userData);
557 void cancelCallback(void);
558 virtual void ignoreTypes(bool midiSysex, bool midiTime, bool midiSense);
559 double getMessage(std::vector<unsigned char> *message);
560 virtual void setBufferSize(unsigned int size, unsigned int count);
561
562 // A MIDI structure used internally by the class to store incoming
563 // messages. Each message represents one and only one MIDI message.
564 struct MidiMessage
565 {
566 std::vector<unsigned char> bytes;
567
569 double timeStamp;
570
571 // Default constructor.
572 MidiMessage()
573 : bytes(0), timeStamp(0.0) {}
574 };
575
576 struct MidiQueue
577 {
578 unsigned int front;
579 unsigned int back;
580 unsigned int ringSize;
581 MidiMessage *ring;
582
583 // Default constructor.
584 MidiQueue()
585 : front(0), back(0), ringSize(0), ring(0) {}
586 bool push(const MidiMessage &);
587 bool pop(std::vector<unsigned char> *, double *);
588 unsigned int size(unsigned int *back = 0, unsigned int *front = 0);
589 };
590
591 // The RtMidiInData structure is used to pass private class data to
592 // the MIDI input handling function or thread.
593 struct RtMidiInData
594 {
595 MidiQueue queue;
596 MidiMessage message;
597 unsigned char ignoreFlags;
598 bool doInput;
599 bool firstMessage;
600 void *apiData;
601 bool usingCallback;
602 RtMidiIn::RtMidiCallback userCallback;
603 void *userData;
604 bool continueSysex;
605 unsigned int bufferSize;
606 unsigned int bufferCount;
607
608 // Default constructor.
609 RtMidiInData()
610 : ignoreFlags(7), doInput(false), firstMessage(true), apiData(0), usingCallback(false),
611 userCallback(0), userData(0), continueSysex(false), bufferSize(1024), bufferCount(4) {}
612 };
613
614protected:
615 RtMidiInData inputData_;
616};
617
618class RTMIDI_DLL_PUBLIC MidiOutApi : public MidiApi
619{
620public:
621 MidiOutApi(void);
622 virtual ~MidiOutApi(void);
623 virtual void sendMessage(const unsigned char *message, size_t size) = 0;
624};

626// **************************************************************** //

628// Inline RtMidiIn and RtMidiOut definitions.

630// **************************************************************** //
631
632inline RtMidi::Api RtMidiIn ::getCurrentApi(void) throw() { return rtapi_->getCurrentApi(); }
633inline void RtMidiIn ::openPort(unsigned int portNumber, const std::string &portName) { rtapi_->openPort(portNumber, portName); }
634inline void RtMidiIn ::openVirtualPort(const std::string &portName) { rtapi_->openVirtualPort(portName); }
635inline void RtMidiIn ::closePort(void) { rtapi_->closePort(); }
636inline bool RtMidiIn ::isPortOpen() const { return rtapi_->isPortOpen(); }
637inline void RtMidiIn ::setCallback(RtMidiCallback callback, void *userData) { static_cast<MidiInApi *>(rtapi_)->setCallback(callback, userData); }
638inline void RtMidiIn ::cancelCallback(void) { static_cast<MidiInApi *>(rtapi_)->cancelCallback(); }
639inline unsigned int RtMidiIn ::getPortCount(void) { return rtapi_->getPortCount(); }
640inline std::string RtMidiIn ::getPortName(unsigned int portNumber) { return rtapi_->getPortName(portNumber); }
641inline void RtMidiIn ::ignoreTypes(bool midiSysex, bool midiTime, bool midiSense) { static_cast<MidiInApi *>(rtapi_)->ignoreTypes(midiSysex, midiTime, midiSense); }
642inline double RtMidiIn ::getMessage(std::vector<unsigned char> *message) { return static_cast<MidiInApi *>(rtapi_)->getMessage(message); }
643inline void RtMidiIn ::setErrorCallback(RtMidiErrorCallback errorCallback, void *userData) { rtapi_->setErrorCallback(errorCallback, userData); }
644inline void RtMidiIn ::setBufferSize(unsigned int size, unsigned int count) { static_cast<MidiInApi *>(rtapi_)->setBufferSize(size, count); }
645
646inline RtMidi::Api RtMidiOut ::getCurrentApi(void) throw() { return rtapi_->getCurrentApi(); }
647inline void RtMidiOut ::openPort(unsigned int portNumber, const std::string &portName) { rtapi_->openPort(portNumber, portName); }
648inline void RtMidiOut ::openVirtualPort(const std::string &portName) { rtapi_->openVirtualPort(portName); }
649inline void RtMidiOut ::closePort(void) { rtapi_->closePort(); }
650inline bool RtMidiOut ::isPortOpen() const { return rtapi_->isPortOpen(); }
651inline unsigned int RtMidiOut ::getPortCount(void) { return rtapi_->getPortCount(); }
652inline std::string RtMidiOut ::getPortName(unsigned int portNumber) { return rtapi_->getPortName(portNumber); }
653inline void RtMidiOut ::sendMessage(const std::vector<unsigned char> *message) { static_cast<MidiOutApi *>(rtapi_)->sendMessage(&message->at(0), message->size()); }
654inline void RtMidiOut ::sendMessage(const unsigned char *message, size_t size) { static_cast<MidiOutApi *>(rtapi_)->sendMessage(message, size); }
655inline void RtMidiOut ::setErrorCallback(RtMidiErrorCallback errorCallback, void *userData) { rtapi_->setErrorCallback(errorCallback, userData); }
